content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) for coal extraction.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) for additional storage.
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) transferring items from the Wooden Chest at position (56.5, -83.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Inserter mechanisms and chests for managing input and output of materials.

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting various positions for efficient material transport, including:
  - Belt from (50.5, -86.5) to (48.5, -86.5), direction LEFT.
  - Belt from (49.5, -86.5) to (47.5, -86.5), direction LEFT.
  - Belt from (43.5, -84.5) to (45.5, -84.5), direction RIGHT.
  - Belt from (45.5, -85.5) to (47.5, -85.5), direction RIGHT.
  - Belt from (52.5, -83.5) to (52.5, -85.5), direction UP.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Chest Full Warnings
- Regularly check and empty chests to prevent mining operations from halting due to full storage.
